thread.section_title: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London ExCel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good Hotel -
thread.title_full: Good Hotel - Review of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London ExCel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Serial-Diner
title: Good Hotel -
text:
I attended a recent conference at the Excel Conference Centre in London Docklands and booked this hotel because of its close proximity.
This is a good hotel. Excellent staff. Great breakfast and nice bar area to relax. There is also a gym on-site but I didn't frequent so cannot comment.
It basically has everything that you need. It is also situated within 10mins of London City Airport.
